properties:
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , USER_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , ? )
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? , NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?

UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
